title: 2 Days / 1 Night Flying Safari from Zanzibar to Selous Game Reserve
shortDescription: Fly from Zanzibar into the vast Selous (Nyerere) wilderness for a full-day game drive, overnight in a lodge or camp, and a tranquil boat safari before returning to the islands.

days.title: Day 1 – Zanzibar to Selous, full-day game drive
days.description: You will be collected early from your hotel in Zanzibar and driven to the airport for the morning flight to Selous Game Reserve (now Nyerere National Park). On arrival at the airstrip you meet your safari guide and set out on a full-day game drive, with a picnic lunch in the bush. The reserve is home to elephant, buffalo, giraffe, zebra, lion, leopard, hyena, wild dog and more, all spread across a huge, lightly visited landscape. In the late afternoon you return to your lodge or tented camp inside or close to the reserve for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Day 2 – Boat safari and return to Zanzibar
days.description: After breakfast you head out on a relaxed boat safari, following the river channels and lagoons that draw in hippos, crocodiles and birdlife. A picnic lunch is included. Later in the afternoon you drive back to the airstrip for your return flight to Zanzibar. On arrival you are met and driven back to your hotel on the islands, usually arriving in time for a quiet evening.

title: 1 Day Flying Safari from Zanzibar to Mikumi National Park
shortDescription: Fly from Zanzibar to Mikumi for a full-day game drive in classic Tanzanian savannah before returning to the islands by evening.

days.title: Day 1 – Zanzibar to Mikumi and back
days.description: You will be collected from your hotel in Zanzibar at around 05:00 and driven to the airport for the 07:00 flight to Mikumi National Park. On arrival you are met at the airstrip by your safari guide and set out on a full-day game drive through classic East African savannah. Mikumi is Tanzania's fourth largest national park and is home to elephant, zebra, impala, wildebeest, buffalo, giraffe, lion and more, with acacia, baobab and open plains creating wide views. A simple lunch is taken inside the park so that you can stay close to the wildlife and light. In the afternoon you continue your game drive until around 16:00, when you return to the airstrip for your flight back to Zanzibar. On arrival, usually around 17:00, you are met and driven back to your hotel on the islands.

title: 1 Day Flying Safari from Zanzibar to Selous Game Reserve
shortDescription: Fly from Zanzibar into the vast Selous wilderness for a full-day game drive before returning to the coast by evening.

days.title: Day 1 – Full-day safari in Selous and return to Zanzibar
days.description:
You will be collected from your hotel in Zanzibar at around 05:00 and driven to the airport for the morning flight to Selous Game Reserve (part of the wider Nyerere ecosystem). After landing at the airstrip, usually around 08:00, you meet your guide and begin a full-day game drive through one of Africa's largest protected wilderness areas. Selous is home to elephant, lion, leopard, buffalo, Masai giraffe, plains zebra, hippo, crocodile, wild dog and many other species, set against a backdrop of rivers, woodland and open plains. A picnic or bush lunch is served in a scenic spot so you can stay close to the wildlife and light.

In the afternoon you continue exploring different areas of the reserve until it is time to return to the airstrip for your scheduled flight back to Zanzibar, typically departing around 16:00. On arrival at Zanzibar Airport, usually around 17:00, you are met and transferred back to your hotel for a quiet evening by the sea.
